protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-22776
protocol.text: Etiolated seedlings were germinated on Murashig and Skoog (MS) medium (on agar plates) without sucrose. 3 days after germination, seedling were transfered in liquid MS (in light) and harvested after 6 hours.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-22777
protocol.text: After 3 days of germination, etiolated seedlings were transfered to light conditions in liquid Murashig and Skoog medium without sucrose. After 5 hours, 10 microMolar auxin (IAA) was added to all treated samples except to controls (Mock treatment). Samples were harvested one-hour after treatment and frozen for further RNA extraction.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-22778
protocol.text: QIAGEN protocol for plants and fungi. Frozen seedlings were ground in liquid nitrogen. 450ul of buffer RLT were added to 100mg of powder and the tube was centrifuged (15s,8000g). Lysate was added to 0.5 volume of ethanol and applied to RNeasy mini column and thus centrifuged (15s, 8000g). DNAse treatment was carried out according to the protocol. 700ul of buffer RW1 were added and the column was centrifuged (15s, 8000g) the column was centrifuged once to remove buffer RPE. Total RNA was eluted with 30 ul of rnase-free water

protocol.name: P-MEXP-29361
text: Normalized signal intensities using generated using the Affymetrix MAS 5.0 default algorithm for each CEL file. The caluclation was performed using the RACE web site at University of Lausanne (

). This software is described in: Psarros M, Heber S, Sick M, Thoppae G, Harshman K, Sick B. RACE: Remote Analysis Computation for gene Expression data. Nucleic Acids Res. 2005 Jul 1;33(Web Server issue):W638-43.
